reviews.text: The restaurant was the best we tried in Lisbon, food was all excellent especially the pork and the octopus. So delicious! They also have a very good wine selection and the staff (Nono and Claudia) are absolutely kind professional and sweet! We had dinner 3 times here, we are from Italy and we appreciate a lot good food wine and service! Also live music is a winner, we absolutely suggest this lovely place

"Grapes and Bites Lisbon is such a vibe! Amazing Portuguese food that'll make your taste buds dance, plus they've got a killer wine list that'll keep you coming back for more. The live music sets the perfect mood - not too loud, just right. Super cozy spot to hang out with friends or grab a date night dinner. üç∑‚ú®"

Second time in Lisbon and second time here. My favorite restaurant in Lisbon for sure. Amazing atmosphere and the best food I tried in Portugal. This time with the plus of live music. I‚Äôm recommending it to all my friends!

We really enjoyed our dinner here.
The food was delicious and well served.
The wine selection and suggestions were great, a big compliment to the experienced staff.
The vibes were great with wine bottles all over and live music played by an excellent guitarist. Cozy and informal atmosphere to enjoy your time even more.
Overall, highly recommended.
Superb winebar with great selection of wines (also by glass) and delicious food. We also have possibility to listen very nice girl singing classics!
